OOC: First of all, Rudra was gracious to let me in on this, since we had a
word war before that I eventually stopped, I apologize for keeping it
running as long as it did, so I say sorry, to Rudra, who turns out to not be
a bad person at all...

BIC: Perplex: Well, we can tag along with you, we don't want to fight, and I
don't want my brother or grampa to get hurt. Myself, is another story, but I
would prefer not to fight if I do not have to...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 9:37 AM
Subject: Re: Meowmix


> ::Aerotaur::
>       "You are all welcome to join us.  It seems we have quite a little
group
> forming.  And yet we have no mission.  We are wanderers.  is there
somewhere
> you would like us to take you."  He looked at each of them in turn ending
> with the little one by Trinity.  "We welcome all people regardless of
their
> past."
>
>
>
